title: Staff Frontend Engineer
location: Work where you want, when you want
description: Lead frontend development for BaseBuzz, shaping next-gen DeFi experiences across trading, governance, and analytics.
fullDescription:
BaseBuzz is at the forefront of AI-powered DeFi, real-world asset tokenization, and automated governance. As a Staff Frontend Engineer, you'll build and optimize interfaces that power decentralized trading, governance dashboards, and on-chain analytics.

This role is perfect for engineers passionate about crafting elegant, performant Web3 interfaces. You will lead the development of high-impact user experiences for BaseBuzz’s ecosystem, including Rugtron3000, MemePro, and DeFi governance tooling.
responsibilities: Architect, develop, and optimize high-performance frontend applications across the BaseBuzz ecosystem.
Take ownership of our web products, ensuring a seamless, high-quality user experience.
Implement complex UI components and interactive visualizations for DeFi analytics, governance, and trading dashboards.
Collaborate with backend and smart contract engineers to integrate live on-chain data and decentralized APIs.
Lead frontend architecture discussions, focusing on scalability, performance, and accessibility.
Provide mentorship to junior engineers, fostering best practices in frontend development and UI/UX design.

mustHave: 8+ years of frontend engineering experience, with deep expertise in React and TypeScript.
Proven experience building and shipping complex frontend applications, ideally in fintech, trading, or DeFi.
A strong understanding of modern client-side application architecture, state management, and UI performance optimization.
Experience building and maintaining a design system or component library.
Familiarity with the Web3 frontend stack (ethers.js/web3.js, EIP-1193, wallet integrations, etc.).
Ability to work autonomously, drive technical decisions, and ship features rapidly.
niceToHave: Experience optimizing blockchain UI/UX for DeFi traders, governance participants, and liquidity providers.
Background in WebGL, Three.js, or advanced data visualization techniques for on-chain analytics.
Contributions to open-source frontend frameworks or libraries.
Experience leading frontend engineering teams in a startup or high-growth environment.
A passion for DeFi, trading, and cutting-edge financial interfaces.

benefits: Exclusive access to DeFi trading tools and governance incentives.
On-chain reputation tracking—build your verified Web3 engineering profile.
Work at the intersection of AI, DeFi, and next-gen financial infrastructure.
